triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: The paper critically reviews machine learning as a branch of AI and its methodological limitations.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper discusses ML as a branch of AI and examines AI's foundational role in modern computing.

triples.name: Neural network (machine learning)
triples.relevance: The paper discusses ANNs as a formalism achieving extraordinary achievements and examines their black-box nature.

triples.name: Computer vision
triples.relevance: The paper cites computer vision as a complex problem where ANNs have achieved remarkable success.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: The paper references natural language recognition as one of the complex problems where ANNs excel.

triples.name: Supervised learning
triples.relevance: The paper discusses supervised learning as one of the paradigms where machines attempt to learn from data.

triples.name: Unsupervised learning
triples.relevance: The paper mentions unsupervised learning as a learning mode that does not necessarily provide causal explanations.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper identifies reinforcement learning as a recent advancement showing similarities to human cognitive learning.

triples.name: Imitation learning
triples.relevance: The paper cites imitation learning as a recent advancement demonstrating similarities to human learning processes.
